data.title: List of Alternate Monarchs and Aristocratic Lineage
data.meta_description: An easy way of finding the family tree, based on head of family or point of difference.
data.text:
HIM Emperor Alexis I of Russia (1629 - 1676) and HIM Empress Consort Maria Alexseyevna of Russia, Nee Conteuss Maria Miloslavskaya (1629 - 1674)

Marry in November of 1647 (18 and 18)

1648 - 1691 HIH Tsarevich Dmitri Alexeyevich of Russia - Emperor of Russia, Marry HH Princess Dorothea Maria of Saxe Gotha Altenburg in 1667

1649 - 1719 HIH Grand Duchess Yevdokia Alexeyevna of Russia - Conteuss of Russia, Marry Russian Count in 1665 and Have 4 Sons and 6 Daughters

1650 - 1709 HIH Grand Duchess Maria Alexeyevna - Conteuss of Russia, Marry Russian Count in 1667 and Have 3 Sons and 3 Daughters

1652 - 1724 HIH Grand Duke Nathasha Alexeyevna of Russia - Conteuss of Russia, Marry a Russian Count in 1667 and Have 3 Daughters

1654 - 1661 HIH Grand Duchess Anna Alexeyevna of Russia

1655 - 1721 HIH Grand Duchess Sofia Alexeyevna of Russia - Conteuss of Russia, Marry Russian Count in 1671 and Have 6 Daughters

1657 - 1714 HIH Grand Duchess Helena Alexseyevna - Conteuss of Russia, Marry Russian Count in 1673 and Have 2 Sons and 1 Daughter

Alexis I Reign 1647 - 1684

** The Husbands of Yevdokia, Maria, Sophia and Helena Became Princes

HIM Emperor Dmitri I of Russia (1648 - 1696) and HIM Empress Consort Maria Dmitrievna of Russia, Nee HH Princess Dorothea Maria of Saxe Gotha Altenburg (1651 - 1706)

Marry in July of 1667 (18 and 16)

1668 - 1744 HIH Grand Duchess Maria Dmitrievna of Russia - Grand Duchess of Hesse Darmstadt , Marry HH Landgrave Ernest Louis of Hesse Darmstadt in 1684 and Have 2 Sons and 2 Daughters

1669 - 1669 Abortation

1671 - 1731 HIH Tsarevich Peter Dmitrievich of Russia - Emperor of Russia, Marry HH Margravine Elisabeth Sophie of Brandenburg in 1689

Dmitri I Reign 1684 - 1691

HIM Emperor Peter I of Russia (1671 - 1731) and HIM Empress Consort Elisabeth Petrovna of Russia, Nee HH Margravine Elisabeth Sophie of Brandenburg (1674 - 1749)

Marry in October of 1689 (18 and 15)

Peter I Reign 1691 - 1731

HIH Tsarevich Peter Petrovich of Russia (1690 - 1724) and HIM Empress Consort Sophia Feodorovna of Russia, Nee HH Princess Sophie of Anhalt Dornburg (1692 - 1756)

Marry in September of 1708 (18 and 16)

1711 - 1774 HIH Grand Duchess Sophie Petrovna of Russia - Grand Duchess of Russia and Duchess of Schleswig-Holstein-Gotorp, Marry HH Duke Charles Frederick of Schleswig-Holstein-Gotorp in 1727 and Have 2 Sons and 3 Daughters

1713 - 1781 HIH Grand Duchess Anna Petrovna of Russia - Queen of Sweden, Marry HM King Adolf Frederick of Sweden in 1729 and 3 Sons and 1 Daughter

Peter Never Became a Emperor Since He Died 7 Years Before His Father

HIM Empress Elisabeth I of Russia (1709 - 1756) and HIM Emperor Consort Peter Feodorovich of Russia, Nee Prince Charles August of Holstein-Gotorp (1706 - 1761)

1729 - 1796 HIH Tsarevna Catherine Elisabethievna of Russia - Empress of Russia, Marry HH Prince Frederick Ferdinand of Schleswig-Holstein-Gotorp in 1747

1730 Stilborn Son

Elisabeth I Reign 1731 - 1756
